name: Michael Howell From Capital Wars
title: Global Liquidity Watch Weekly Update
text:
Synopsis
Global liquidity is stabilizing, with improving conditions from central banks and bond markets potentially signaling a recovery for risk assets and cryptocurrencies.

Key Insights
- Central Bank liquidity is improving, particularly from the PBoC and ECB, though Fed liquidity remains a concern
- Collateral values (bonds) are increasing
- US dollar momentum is losing steam
- Bond market volatility has retreated from its November peak
- Gold and risk assets lost momentum in October 2024 but have recently recovered
- The newsletter suggests more liquidity is needed to sustain the current market recovery
